examples.title: Create a user profile card
examples.body: Can you help me create a new React component for a user profile card? It should display the user's avatar, name, and bio in a modern and responsive design.

examples.title: Add form validation
examples.body: Help me implement form validation for my login page. I need to validate email format and ensure password meets security requirements like minimum length and special characters.

examples.title: Implement dark mode
examples.body: Add a dark mode toggle to my application. It should persist the user's preference and apply appropriate styles across all components automatically.
